comment:
* CookiePolicy implementations decide which cookies should be accepted * and which should be rejected. Three pre-defined policy implementations * are provided, namely ACCEPT_ALL, ACCEPT_NONE and ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER. * *

See RFC 2965 sec. 3.3 and 7 for more detail. * * @author Edward Wang * @since 1.6

variables.name: ACCEPT_ALL
variables.comment: * One pre-defined policy which accepts all cookies.

variables.name: ACCEPT_NONE
variables.comment: * One pre-defined policy which accepts no cookies.

variables.name: ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER
variables.comment: * One pre-defined policy which only accepts cookies from original server.

methods.name: public boolean shouldAccept(URI uri, HttpCookie cookie)

methodNames: public boolean shouldAccept(URI uri, HttpCookie cookie)
